{{also|pommes|pommés}} ==German== ===Etymology=== Short from {{m|de|Pommes frites}} with a spelling pronunciation. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈpɔməs/}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|f||Pommes}} # {{lb|de|plural}} [[fries]], [[French fries]], [[chips]] {{qualifier|UK}} #: {{ux|de|Ich esse gern '''Pommes'''.|I like fries.}} # {{lb|de|singular|colloquial}} a single [[fry]], a single [[chip]] {{qualifier|UK}} #: {{ux|de|Mir ist ’ne '''Pommes''' runtergefallen.|I’ve dropped a fry.}} # {{lb|de|singular|colloquial}} a [[portion]] of [[fries]] #: {{ux|de|Bringst Du mir eine Portion '''Pommes''' mit?|Can you get me some fries?}} ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-f|}} ====Synonyms==== * {{l|de|Fritte|g=f}}, {{l|de|Fritten|g=p}} * {{l|de|Pommes frites|g=p}} * {{sense|a portion of fries}} {{l|de|eine [[Portion]] Pommes}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:de:Foods]]
